name: vue-essential-slices
description: A set of professionally made, accessible Vue components, linked to a (Prismic) backend

scripts.prepare: git clone https://github.com/vuejs/vue-loader temp; rm -rf node_modules/vue-loader; mv temp node_modules/vue-loader
scripts.build-storybook: npm run prepare && cd node_modules; build-storybook -c .storybook
